segments.text: Hold on a second please . I'm sorry . He has gone out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh.This is Paul.When will he be back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He will be back at about seven o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I leave a message please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please tell him I'll call him at the office tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I'll tell him when he comes back .
segments.speaker: S2
